WorkItem.Description:
Using change set 24976, I can start the game, select the number of players and select the terrain all splendidly. However, once I click "Start" after picking my terrain, I get an Out of Memory exception. Here is the error message:
 
An unhandled exception of type 'System.OutOfMemoryException' occurred in Microsoft.Xna.Framework.dll
 
Additional information: OutOfMemoryException
 
This happens in Terrain's constructor, when the code reaches the line "BackgroundLeft.GetData<Color>(colordata);" This is line 185 of Terrain.cs.
